safetyTips: Door step delivery and collection of tipi and accessories, customer Is required set up the tipis to ensure social distancing is met.
name: A TIPI NIGHT'S DREAM
description: We supply amazing Tipis’s and all the accessories for children’s sleepovers during lockdown.   Our tipis are perfect for children who are celebrating their birthdays or even as a little treat during lockdown we even have adult sized beds if you want to join in the fun.  This is a DIY service, everything you need is supplied as per our usual setups, however you will be required to set up the tipis which is extremely fun and easy to do.  Get in touch via Facebook, Whatsapp or email.
